spec: I will generate an interactive line chart that displays the US population from 1900 to 2000. The chart will be built using Chart.js and the data will be stored in the state object. The user will be able to hover over data points to see the exact population value for that year.
js: state.populationData = [76.2, 92.2, 105.7, 123.2, 132.1, 150.7, 179.3, 203.2, 226.5, 248.7]; state.years = [1900, 1910, 1920, 1930, 1940, 1950, 1960, 1970, 1980, 1990, 2000]; const ctx = document.getElementById('populationChart').getContext('2d'); new Chart(ctx, { type: 'line', data: { labels: state.years, datasets: [{ label: 'US Population', data: state.populationData, fill: false, borderColor: 'rgb(75, 192, 192)', tension: 0.1 }] }, options: { responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, interaction: { mode: 'index', intersect: false }, tooltips: { mode: 'index', intersect: false } } });
description: An interactive line chart that displays the US population from 1900 to 2000. Users can hover over data points to see the exact population value for that year.
